title: Automationstekniker/Programmerare till UMIA Nord AB
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

Umia Nord AB är en del av den starkt växande Umia-koncernen som har cirka 800 medarbetare i lokalägda dotterbolag från Luleå i norr till Ystad i söder. Koncernen omsätter ca 1,3 miljarder kronor.
  
  

I Luleå är Umia Nord AB en betydande arbetsgivare med cirka 120 anställda, varav 16 arbetar inom styr och regleravdelningen.
  
Vi utför arbeten åt myndigheter, statliga bolag, fastighetsbolag, kommunen och byggföretag.
  
  

Vår idé är att se alla teknikområden som en sammanhållen enhet. Vi kallar det Umiamodellen – en samarbetsfilosofi som både våra medarbetare och kunder gillar.
  
  

**Om tjänsten:**  

Som Automationstekniker/Programmerare hos Umia kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i utvecklingen av framtidens fastighetsautomation. Du kommer att arbeta med programmering, konfiguration och installation av avancerade styrsystem, samt ansvara för driftsättning och ombyggnationer för att säkerställa systemens optimala funktion.
  
  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**  

Programmering och konfiguration av styrsystem för fastighetsautomation.
  
  

Installation och driftsättning av fastighetssystem/belysningssystem och liknande lösningar.
  
  

Ombyggnationer i apparatskåp.
  
  

Felsökning och optimering av systemens prestanda.
  
  

Hantering av system som Abelko, Siemens, SAIA, Regin, Web Port och iFIX.
  
  

Vem tror vi att du är?
  
  

En erfaren serviceelektriker med fem års erfarenhet.
  
  

Kunskap i programmering av styrsystem.
  
  

Förståelse för fastighetsautomation och ventilation/VVS-system.
  
  

Förmåga att snabbt anpassa sig till nya teknologier.
  
  

Affärssinne med förståelse för ekonomi och kostnadseffektivitet.
  
  

Skicklig på att planera och organisera arbete.
  
  

Innehar B-körkort och är flexibel för resor till olika arbetsplatser.
  
  

En lagspelare med starkt engagemang och kompetens.
  
  

Självständig med förmåga att samarbeta och ta egna initiativ.
  
  

Ansökan
  
  

Northern Skill är det personliga rekryteringsföretaget med norrländska som koncernspråk och är mer intresserade om vem du är - än hur duktig du är på skriva CV.
  
  

Har du inte världens snyggaste CV så kan du alltid presentera dig genom fritext i ansökan, eller varför inte slå en signal? Vi hörs!

title: Projektledare inom IT
description:
**Om arbetsplatsen**
--------------------


Välkommen till Alingsås! Här hittar du en välbevarad stadskärna och en levande landsbygd med vacker natur. Med goda pendlingsmöjligheter är det också nära till Göteborgs storstadspuls och resten av Västsverige.  

  

Över 42 000 invånare och nära 4 000 medarbetare gör Alingsås till kommunen som är tillräckligt stor för att driva utveckling och tillräckligt liten för att du själva ska kunna vara med och påverka. Tillsammans skapar vi Alingsås!  

  

Kultur- och utbildningsförvaltningens verksamheter omfattas av gymnasieskola, vuxenutbildning, fritidsgårdar, kulturskola, kulturhus, bibliotek, museum, konsthall, turisminformation, evenemangsverksamhet, anläggningar, Nolhaga lantgård, Nolhaga Parkbad samt föreningsstöd. Inom hela förvaltningen arbetar idag cirka 420 medarbetare.


**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------


Kultur- och utbildningsförvaltningen har en bred och variationsrik flora av olika system som ska stödja verksamheternas behov av en modern och anpassad IT-infrastruktur för att lösa sina uppdrag. Vi ser digitalisering som en nyckelfaktor för att lösa våra uppdrag i framtiden, du kommer vara navet i det arbetet inom förvaltningen och stötta verksamheterna för att de ska nå sina mål.  

  

Vi har påbörjat ett arbete med att långsiktigt stärka vår kapacitet inom dataskydd och informationssäkerhet för att utveckla uppföljning, utredning och informationsklassning, där vi ser att denna roll kommer att fortsätta driva det arbetet framåt tillsammans med kollegor i den administrativa enheten.  

  

Viss del av tjänsten kommer att vara att projektleda olika IT-projekt och upphandlingsprocesser och vara delaktig i behovsanalyser. Vi är intresserade av AI och vi vill jobba vidare inom området vilket kommer att bli en del av din roll.
  

  

I nära samarbete med den förvaltningsinterna IT-gruppen, som du leder, arbetar du med att säkerställa relevant stöd till verksamheterna inom system- och digitaliseringsutveckling. Rollen innebär också omfattande kontakter med IT-avdelningen samt externa leverantörer.  

  

Du kommer att delta i förvaltningsövergripande nätverk för samordning och samverkan förvaltningar emellan.  

  

  

**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


Krav för tjänsten är eftergymnasial utbildning, gärna inom systemutveckling, digitalisering, offentlig förvaltning eller annan utbildning som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig. Meriterande för tjänsten är att ha arbetat med dataskydd och informationssäkerhetsfrågor samt har några års erfarenhet av liknande arbete.
  

  

Arbetsuppgifterna har många kontaktytor, både internt och externt som kräver att du har god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska i tal och skrift.  

  

Vi söker en projektledare med teknisk kompetens. Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av digitaliseringsutveckling. Du har kunskap om tekniska verktyg och en förmåga att lösa komplexa tekniska problem i samråd med andra. Kommunikation och samarbete är nyckelkompetenser för rollen som projektledare i denna teknik- och IT-miljö.  

  

Som person är du nyfiken, ambitiös och har en vilja att lära dig nya saker. Du är inte rädd för utmaningar och är en prestigelös teamplayer som uppskattar att samarbeta med andra.  

  

Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.


**Anställningens omfattning**
-----------------------------


Tillträde: Efter överenskommelse


**Övrig information**
---------------------


På https://www.alingsas.se/naringsliv-och-arbete/jobb/vart-erbjudande-2/ kan du läsa mer om vårt erbjudande till dig.
  

  

För att underlätta rekryteringsarbetet ber vi dig att bifoga relevanta intyg och betyg för tjänsten du söker. Vi har endast möjlighet att ta emot ansökningar via Visma Recruit.  

  

Vi har gjort våra val av annonskanaler och vill ej ha kontakt med försäljare eller rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag.

  


**Arbetsplats**  

Alingsås kommun


**Anställningsform**  

Tidsbegränsad anställning


**Yrkeskategori**  

Data/IT


**Sista ansökningsdag**  

2024-07-07


**Omfattning**  

Heltid


**Lön**  

Efter överenskommelse

C198989

title: Genius - IT-tekniker
description:

Publicerad: 21 jun 2024

Du vårdar kundernas förtroende för Apple genom att hjälpa dem med kompetent felsökning och reparation av produkter i Apple Store. Du använder din förmåga att felsöka och din sociala kompetens för att snabbt lösa kundernas tekniska problem i Genius Bar. title: Sales Operations Analyst
description:
Sinch, brings businesses and people closer with tools enabling personal engagement. As a leading global Communication Platform as a Service (CPaaS) provider, we offer messaging, voice, and video communication solutions to a diverse global customer base.
   

  

 Our customer includes more than 600 Mobile Operators worldwide, 8 out of the top 10 largest US tech companies by market capitalization, major airlines, banks, retail, e-commerce, internet, ride-hailing, and parcel delivery companies, among others. Through our Super Network, we connect over 1000 Mobile Operators, offering a unique partnership. We are the world's largest wholesale buyer and a leading provider of SMS P2P Interconnect services to Mobile Operators. Alongside our extensive set of Cloud and Network products, we help Mobile Operators expand service offerings, monetize assets, and cultivate valuable customer relationships. Sinch is publicly listed on the NASDAQ Stockholm stock exchange.
   

  

**Essence Of The Role**
 Requires a strong background in sales, a knack for numbers and a keen eye for the bigger picture and sales processes to ensure smooth operations. Alternatively, you might come from a finance background and aim to work closely with the business. In this role, you will be part of a small team collaborating with the Operator sales department worldwide. We're looking for someone with a "can do" attitude and a quick-learning ability. In return, you will experience a dynamic and supportive setting where you will gain new skills every day.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Manage processes and tools to enable visibility and analysis capabilities on revenue, costs, and traffic volume optimization.
* Enable advanced analytics and insights to provide decision-support based on facts, primarily using Excel, Tableau (BI), Salesforce (CRM), and SAP by Design (ERP).
* Regularly analyze and follow-up customer profitability on traffic destinations and routes, and in close collaboration with Sales and Product Management provide recommendations on optimal market pricing.
* Create management reporting and financial forecasts illustrating results and trends in P2P (Person to Person) and A2P (Application to Person) traffic patterns.
* Participate in and drive price adjustment and customer price notification projects in close cooperation with Account Managers.
* Support the sales organization in the invoice review and approval process.
* Represent the organization in company-wide initiatives surrounding sales supporting infrastructure and tools and drive ad hoc improvement projects.
* Assist the sales organization in complying with and constantly improving our sales process, supporting documentation, and promote the processes' accurate usage.


****This is You:****
 The successful candidate is a committed and pragmatic self-starter who thrives in a high-paced environment and possesses a "whatever it takes" attitude. You have a strong sense of accountability and perseverance to pursue any task until completion with the help of your excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
   

  

**In order to be successful in this role, we believe you have:**
* 2-5 years of experience in sales, finance, sales operations, back office, or similar, preferably within Telecommunications (excluding hardware) or SaaS.
* University degree in Business Administration, Finance, or similar, or equivalent professional experience.
* Strong computer skills, with an eagerness to learn and utilize new systems. Proficient in Excel (basic pivot tables, formulas). Experience using Tableau or similar BI tools and Salesforce is an advantage.
* .Fluency in English and accustomed to using English daily in your job. Proficiency in additional languages such as Swedish, Spanish, French, or Arabic.
* Basic knowledge of sales performance metrics and KPIs, with a clear interest in learning.
* Experience in an international company and role (an advantage).


****Being you at Sinch:****
 We're a worldwide group of people, committed to diversity. We're working to offer an increasingly inclusive workplace wherever you are. No matter who you are, you'll be able to explore new career and growth options - sharing your voice, building your path and making it happen with us.
   

  

 We're proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will be considered to join our team regardless of race, color, religion, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, and more.
   

  

**Are you ready? Join us on our journey!**
**About The Recruitment Process**
 To ensure the right fit, we believe in science-based and fair assessment methods. Our recruitment process involves a competence-based, structured interview process where we assess your skills, experience, and attributes relevant to the role and Sinch. Pre-employment testing is used to identify candidates most likely to thrive and be successful in the role. We acknowledge that both parties make a decision in this process and welcome any questions you may have at any stage.

title: IT-Projektledare till Multisoft
description:
*Multisoft fortsätter att satsa för framtiden och söker nu en Projektledare för deras low-code plattform Softadmin® - en flexibel plattform som erbjuder anpassningsbara och automatiserade systemlösningar inom olika områden såsom ärendehantering, resursplanering, projektledning, bokningssystem och mycket mer. Som en del av Multisofts team kommer du att spela en central roll i att driva och leda flera skräddarsydda kundprojekt, där du aktivt deltar i behovsanalys, kravinsamling och uppfyllande av kundens förväntningar.*
**Om Multisoft**
 Multisoft är ledande inom att leverera anpassningsbara och automatiserade systemlösningar som hjälper företag att spara resurser för kreativitet och värdeskapande. Deras breda utbud av lösningar inkluderar ärendehantering, resursplanering, projekthantering, boknings- och faktureringssystem, orderhantering, integrationsplattformar, onboardingsystem, KYC-system och verksamhetssystem.
   

  

 Multisoft erbjuder Softadmin®, en plattform som passar för alla verksamheter som behöver fullt stöd för sina processer och behov. Med deras low-code plattform Softadmin®, skapar Multisoft effektiva systemlösningar med minimal kodning.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som projektledare på Multisoft spelar du en avgörande roll i att förstå kundernas behov och önskemål. Du tar emot kundens krav och önskemål med öppet sinne och tillsammans med kunderna skissar fram unika och flexibla systemlösningar. Ditt mål är att använda din expertis inom systembyggnad för att erbjuda skräddarsydda lösningar på ett innovativt sätt.
   

  

 Ansvarsområden i rollen inkluderar att säkerställa att projekten uppfyller kundernas förväntningar och levereras i tid och inom budget. Du fungerar som spindeln i nätet och håller ihop projektet från början till slut. Det är även ditt ansvar att kontinuerligt utveckla och vårda kundrelationerna samt erbjuda stöd och rådgivning vid behov.
   

  

 Genom nära samarbete med teamet av systemutvecklare och lösningsarkitekter driver du förbättringar och säkerställer imponerande projektresultat. Ditt arbete är avgörande för att Multisoft ska kunna leverera högkvalitativa och innovativa lösningar till kunderna.
   

  

**Kompetenskrav**
* Erfarenhet av projektledning relaterat till systemutveckling
* Erfarenhet av att planera och leda skräddarsydda kundprojekt med helhetslösningar
* Universitetsutbildning, företrädesvis examen inom relevant område
* Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* Förmåga att aktivt delta i behovsanalys, kravinsamling och möta kundens förväntningar
* Starkt engagemang för problemlösning och passion för att säkerställa kundnöjdhet
* Kompetens inom projektledning av IT-leveranser, inklusive kodimplementering och produktionssättning
* Erfarenhet av konceptuell lösningsdesign och kravkartläggning i samarbete med kunder och projektteam
* Förmåga att planera och följa upp mjukvaruprojekt med fokus på kvalitet, tid och budget


**Din profil**
 Vi söker efter dig vars personlighet präglas av starkt engagemang och en genuin passion för problemlösning för att säkerställa kundnöjdhet inom systemutvecklingsprojekt. Du är social och utåtriktad, med förmågan att effektivt kommunicera med systemutvecklare, kunder och andra intressenter. Ditt helhetstänk är grundläggande för att navigera genom komplexa projekt och uppnå framgång. Vi tror även på din förmåga att motivera ditt team mot gemensamma mål och upprätthålla en hög standard av kommunikation inom både IT och affärsområden. Din ständiga strävan bör vara att hålla kunden nöjd och kontinuerligt utveckla positiva kundrelationer.
   

  

 Multisoft erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där din kompetens och passion får blomma. Multisoft strävar efter att främja en aktiv livsstil och erbjuder förmåner såsom semester, företagsevenemang och möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling.
   

  

 Multisoft har i denna rekrytering valt att samarbeta med Awexia Executive Search. Samtliga frågor avseende tjänsten hänvisas till Ida Edlund via mejl ida.edlund@awexia.com alternativt via telefon + 46 72 212 23 59.
   

  

 Om du uppfyller kriterierna ovan blir första steget i processen att genomföra arbetspsykologiska tester. Därefter gör vi ett första urval för att gå vidare till intervju. Vi använder testverktyg tidigt i processen för att säkerställa att alla kandidater får visa så mycket av sin potential som möjligt.
   

  

 Vi supporterar arbetsmarknaden med den kompetens som efterfrågas. Ändras efterfrågan anpassas vårt sätt att lösa våra kunders behov om så krävs. Vi är lyhörda för vad våra kunder kräver av oss och våra kandidater & konsulter. Kunder från alla delar av den privata och offentliga sektorn vänder sig till oss för våra tjänster av hög kvalitet.

title: Business Analyst
description:
**About The Role**
 The Business Analyst will be responsible for analyzing business processes, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing solutions to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. The ideal candidate will have a strong analytical mindset, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with various stakeholders
   

  

 This role will be part of the Data and Analytics department where you will collaborate with cross- functional teams to analyze business needs, develop solutions and ensure alignment with the business standards.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Perform analyses and reports as assigned (draw new insights, unpack cause/consequence, ROI, and answer questions such as "What's going on?" and "What if we did...?"
* Document your work via Jira (using the provided framework)
* Contribute to additional knowledge and improvements through documentation in Confluence and Atlan.
* Come up with new ideas to analyse how our KPIs work together, and what they mean, including their impact on the business
* Dig deeper to find efficiencies in processes and ways of working
* Work with other business analysts and the rest of the data and analytics team to find, define, and use data to improve communication and data understanding across the company
* Present your work to the team, stakeholders, and entire company to help all become more data-driven
* Give recommendations to your stakeholders to make sure that we are growing the business more efficiently.
* Responsible for adhoc analysis/projects that are complex in nature and present to management, on occasions, with recommendations.


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

 ESSENTIAL SKILLS:
   

  

* Strong academic background is preferred – MSc in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer science, Econometrics, or other relevant education/business experience
* Strong aptitude for collecting data from many sources, carrying out analysis, and providing insight from the findings
* Understanding how data models work and fit together
* Have a mindset that is both structured and service minded
* Ability to explain complex things in an understandable way
* Interest in improving upon yourself and growing within your career
* Fluent in English.


 NICE TO HAVE:
   

  

* Whilst not a prerequisite, candidates with experience in igaming, Data Modelling, R, Python, SQL, Google Analytics, Tableau will be given preference


 WHO WE ARE:
   

  

 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices worldwide.
   

  

 BENEFITS:
   

  

* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

title: Master Data Project Manager
description:
Our partner company who is a leading company in the Paper and Pulp industry, is undergoing a strategic transformation to implement a new unified Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. This initiative aims to streamline our business processes, enhance cross-departmental information flow, and improve data management capabilities.
 



  





 To achieve this, we are looking for an experienced Master Data Project Manager to lead the establishment of a unified Master Data Management function as part of our transformation program. You will oversee a sub-stream within the Data & Migration workstream, focusing on data migration, master data management, and data & information governance. Additionally, you will work on developing the necessary Data Management processes to support our program’s success, such as processes for handling test data in the new ERP system.
 



  





**Role Description and Objectives:** 




 Plan and lead the development of their Master Data Management (MDM) operating model, covering strategy, governance, organization, processes, services, and solutions.
 



 Collaborate with program workstreams and various business units to understand their master data requirements.
 



 Coordinate efficient end-to-end master data processes, focusing on enterprise-wide data, including Product, Commercial, Sourcing, and Finance.
 



 Develop a framework to ensure seamless integration and synchronization of master data across SAP modules and related systems.
 



 Ensure data quality and compliance with quality standards and business rules.
 



 Coordinate with the Migration team to ensure accurate transfer of master data during system implementation.
 



 Support both future and interim master data processes, working closely with other relevant workstreams and projects.
 



 Provide master data services support to the program.
 



 Collaborate closely with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors.
 



 Foster a positive, enjoyable, and solution-oriented work environment.
 



 Report to the data stream lead as part of the program data stream.
 



 Focus on finding the right individual to build a strong function and integrate well with the existing team and organization.
 



  





  





**Skills and Experience Required:**




**6-8 years of project management experience in business transformation projects.** 




**Proven experience in leading and driving teams, ensuring effective collaboration and successful project delivery.** 




**Experience in ERP implementation projects and change management.** 




**Experience leading cross-functional initiatives related to organizational change and new ways of working** 
 .
 



**Strong communication and stakeholder management skills.** 




**Experience in enterprise-wide master data management.** 




**Analytical skills and the ability to work in a cross-functional environment.** 




**Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English, both oral and written.** 




**Relevant knowledge of both business and IT organizations.** 




**A good understanding of processes and concepts within the manufacturing industry, preferably within the process industry.** 




  





  





**Location and Mobility:** 




 •            Required to participate in numerous live workshops in Solna.
 



 •            Some workshops may also be held at other sites.
 



  





**Start:** 
 August
 



**Location:** 
 Solna, hybrid

title: IT Architect - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
For our Stockholm office, we are looking for IT Architects who will collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on local and international client projects! We develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying our technical know-how, experience in IT projects, and analytical and conceptual skills.
 
  




 Shape the world of tomorrow
 
  




* Shape the digital transformation of globally leading companies, ensuring their success by evaluating their capabilities and performing feasibility studies
* Manage small, agile development teams in strategic IT implementation programs, establish modern practices like DevOps and CI/CD, and be in charge of the technical implementation of crucial digital requirements such as cyber resilience
* Analyze, develop, and optimize cutting-edge, customized IT architectures while applying your comprehensive understanding of legacy IT, enterprise solutions, and current market developments and trends such as cloud computing and microservices



  




 You can help us make a difference if you
 
  




* have a degree in computer science, (business) informatics, engineering, or a related field
* have approx. two years of relevant experience in IT consulting or software development (part or full time)
* know that modern tools such as machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile methods, AI, and robotics aren't just buzzwords, but essential to sustainable IT architectures
* have broad technical expertise and interest in technology trends
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English



  




 How you can grow with us
 
  




 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
 
  




*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*

title: Senior Implementation Specialist
description:
We are looking for a Senior Implementation Specialist to join our team!
   

  

 Are you a client focused and analytical problem solver? Do you love technical challenges? Do you consider yourself organized and responsible?
   

  

 Who we are:
   

  

 Enghouse Networks is a product company making commercial off-the-shelf software for telecom operators, carriers, and wholesalers worldwide. We think of ourselves as ambitious, problem-solving relationship builders. At Enghouse every individual matter, new initiatives that can improve our products or the processes by which we work are always welcome and encouraged. People who put words into action are the ones we get along with and the ones that like us the best. So, if you share any such ambitions you may want to look our way.
   

  

 We are now strengthening our Operations team based in Stockholm, Sweden and Bucharest, Romania with a driven and motivated Senior Implementation Specialist. As Senior Implementation Specialist you have an important and central role within our organization as you will be in direct and daily contact with our clients. The job you do will matter!
   

  

 What will you be doing?
   

  

 The role of the Senior Implementation Specialist involves responsibility for customer engagement, deployments, integration projects and support.
   

  

 To be a good match for the role, we see that you have advanced troubleshooting of BSS applications (business support systems), as well as general troubleshooting of related third-party software and system environment. The systems are developed and run on Linux server environment, the databases are Oracle or PostgreSQL
   

  

 Your daily responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Perform configurations, integrations, and testing of deployments.
* Prioritize and perform analysis and problem solving for ongoing support tickets.
* Drive projects and actively participate in Agile teams alongside customers.
* Translate customer requirements into high-level designs and solutions.
* Utilize advanced troubleshooting skills in BSS (Business Support Systems), third-party software, and system environments, in order to proactively reduce support requests.
* Spearhead initiatives for new automation methods to expedite service activation and ensure robust implementations.
* Documentation of installations and configuration changes and knowledge sharing thereof


 Would you fit in our team?
   

  

*You’d likely be an appreciated contributor to our team if you:*
* Have a spirit for taking on challenges and solving puzzles that come your way.
* Are curious, fearless and love to get into details of new technology. You are not afraid to take responsibility nor own initiatives.
* Have an analytical mindset and ability to work in a structured way. You value quality and strive for continuous improvements.


*We emphasize the importance of:*
* A relevant educational background within IT or equivalent
* Experience working in technical support or with technical implementation projects.
* Troubleshooting experience working with Oracle, PostgreSQL, T-SQL as well as UNIX/Linux
* Experience working within telecom software and any of our product domains. Our product domain includes Telecommunication, Mediation, Interconnect Billing, Roaming, Settlement, Revenue Assurance, Fraud Management, Least Cost Routing, Trading, Partner settlements and Recurrent Charging.
* Strong English skills, both written and spoken, are mandatory.


*What we believe is advantageous:*
* Experience working with B2B and enterprise products.
* Experience working with huge amounts of data and transaction-heavy applications.
* Experience in log analysis and troubleshooting automated file flows.
* Experience in Java or any type of scripting is a plus.
* Experience in BIRT, Qlik and APIs is a plus.
* Experience with the following technologies is a plus: Kubernetes, AWS, Prometheus, Grafana, Alert Manager and OpenShift.


*Enghouse is an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.*

title: Dynamics 365 Functional consultant/Solution Architect – SCM
description:
Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O Functional Solution Consultant/Architect - Supply Chain
 



  





 Stockholm Malmø Gøteborg - It is a prerequisite that Swedish can be written and spoken at a professional level.
 



  





 One of Europe's largest Microsoft Dynamics partners is establishing itself in Sweden and is now looking for Dynamics consultants and project managers for their first project in Sweden.
 



  





 The company focuses on the process industry, having developed ISV solutions for Pharma, Life Science, Chemicals, and Food & Beverage on top of Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. They are firmly rooted in these industries and come with an extensive catalog of references.
 



  





 You will be part of the company from the beginning and can have significant influence in building and growing the business in Sweden, while also shaping the company culture alongside your colleagues.
 



  





 The company is already established in Sweden with other subsidiaries, ensuring that support functions are already in place for a smooth start-up. This also provides the opportunity to have colleagues and various social events from day one.
 



  





  





 The company is headquartered in Europe, is a member of the Inner Circle for Microsoft Business Applications and has won Partner of the Year for Western Europe. They have more than 670 Dynamics customers and over 650 Dynamics consultants.
 



  





 About the job:
 



 You will be involved from the start of the projects - From pre-sales to being part of the implementation team, where you will have significant influence on the solution.
 



  





 As a Consultant/Functional Solution Architect, your primary task will be to take professional responsibility for solutions within SCM. You will be a key figure in the project's development and implementation.
 



  





 Your role will involve close collaboration with the customer and other consultants on the project to create the best solutions. You will work alongside the best consultants in the industry within the process industry and be part of a team with high expertise.
 



  





 Who are you?
 



 You are an experienced and visionary professional with a solid understanding of Microsoft Dynamics 365, especially within the production & SCM modules, preferably within the process industry.
 



  





 With at least 5 years of experience as a consultant within D365FO / AX, you have a strong background in implementing large IT solutions and are comfortable navigating complex projects.
 



  





 Your ability to work across cultures and build strong relationships will be key to success in this position.
 



  





 Want to hear more?
 



 If you are up for an informal chat about the job, feel free to contact Easter Hay Att. Kim Mikkelsen at phone +45 4122 0032 / kimi@easterhay.dk.

title: Pre-sales Manager (Data, Analytics & AI)
description:
**Req ID: FEQ325R68**
 As a Pre-sales Manager (Data, Analytics & AI) you will lead a team of pre-sales Solutions Architects focusing on complex, strategic accounts, helping to lead our Nordics expansion. Your experience partnering with sales organisations will help to close revenue with opportunities in consumption sales whilst coaching new sales and pre-sales team members to work together. You will guide your team and be involved with opportunities to enhance your team's effectiveness. You must be an expert at communicating complex, business value-focused solutions; supporting complex sales cycles; and building relationships with key stakeholders in large corporations.
   

  

 You will report to the Senior Manager, Field Engineering.
   

  

**The Impact You Will Have**
* Manage hiring, onboarding and building your Pre-Sales Solutions Architect team
* Rapidly scale the designated team without sacrificing quality
* Build a collaborative culture within a rapid-growth team. To embody and promote Databricks' customer-obsessed, teamwork and diverse culture
* Support increase in consumption sales on investment of Solutions Architect involvement in sales cycles
* Promote a solution and value-based selling field-engineering organisation
* Display an understanding of business needs and revenue potential for accounts in the assigned region
* Build Databricks' brand in Nordics in partnership with the Marketing and Sales team


**What We Look For**
* Experience in pre-sales manager role in developing, managing and building a team of successful Big Data, Cloud, Analytics or AI professionals
* Experience in complex strategic accounts generating consumption sales
* Have experience scaling and mentoring field and technical teams
* Knowledgeable in and passionate about data-driven decisions, AI, Analytics and Cloud software models
* Great at instituting processes for technical field members to improve efficiency
* Market experience of the EMEA region
* Fluent language skills in English and Swedish
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or equivalent work experience


**Benefits**
* Private Medical Insurance
* Vision Reimbursement
* Life, accident and disability coverage
* Pension Plan
* Equity awards
* Enhanced Parental Leaves
* Fitness reimbursement
* Annual career development fund
* Home office & work headphones reimbursement
* Business travel accident insurance
* Mental wellness resources
* Employee referral bonus


**About Databricks**
 Databricks is the data and AI company. More than 10,000 organizations worldwide — including Comcast, Condé Nast, Grammarly, and over 50% of the Fortune 500 — rely on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to unify and democratize data, analytics and AI. Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices around the globe and was founded by the original creators of Lakehouse, Apache Spark™, Delta Lake and MLflow. To learn more, follow Databricks on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 At Databricks, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive culture where everyone can excel. We take great care to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards. Individuals looking for employment at Databricks are considered without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.
   

  

**Compliance**
**If access to export-controlled technology or source code is required for performance of job duties, it is within Employer's discretion whether to apply for a U.S. government license for such positions, and Employer may decline to proceed with an applicant on this basis alone.**

title: Executive Assistant (Country Managing Director)
description:
**Who are we?**
 Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company®, operating over 250 data centers across the globe. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect foundational infrastructure at software speed. Equinix enables organizations to access all the right places, partners and possibilities to scale with agility, speed the launch of digital services, deliver world-class experiences and multiply their value, while supporting their sustainability goals.
   

  

 A career at Equinix means you will collaborate on work that impacts the world and be surrounded by endless opportunities to learn new skills and grow in varied directions. We embrace diversity in thought and contribution and are committed to providing an equitable work environment that is foundational to our core values as a company and is vital to our success.
   

  

 Executive Assistant (Country Managing Director)
   

  

**Job Summary**
 This is a hybrid role (3 days office based).This position offers an exciting opportunity to work closely with the Managing Director and contribute to the success of the organization. If you are a proactive and organized individual with a passion to learn, we encourage you to apply.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Meeting/Event Planning
   

  

* Organize meetings, including scheduling, room reservations, and logistical arrangements
* Support the executive in preparing presentations and other materials, ensuring accuracy and quality
* Develop meeting agendas and ensure all necessary materials are prepared and distributed
* Plan and coordinate special events, such as conferences, seminars, and team-building activities


 Communications
   

  

* Maintain an organized filing system for important documents, reports, and correspondence
* Prepare compelling presentations
* Support the approvals process by preparing and distributing necessary documents
* Screen and prioritize incoming communications, including emails, phone calls, and messages
* Collaborate with other administrative staff and executive assistants to ensure seamless operations
* Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures
* Maintain strict confidentiality of sensitive information and handle it with utmost discretion


 Special Projects
   

  

* Coordinate and assist with special projects as assigned by the Managing Director
* Conduct research and gather information on various topics as requested
* Assist in the preparation and distribution of meeting materials, taking notes, and compiling meeting minutes as required
* Create action plans with clear roles, responsibilities, and deadlines
* Utilize project management skills to coordinate and track tasks and deadlines


 Budget/Expense Management
   

  

* Manage budgets and track expenses to ensure adherence to financial guidelines
* Process expense reports and purchase orders accurately and in a timely manner


 Calendar/Travel Management
   

  

* Coordinate the Managing Director's calendar, including scheduling appointments, meetings, and travel arrangements
* Arrange travel accommodations, including flights, accommodations, and transportation


**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant software
* Excellent organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively
* Strong verbal and written communication skills, with a keen eye for detail
* Ability to work independently with minimal supervision and as part of a team
* Discretion and professionalism when handling confidential information
* Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines
* Background in project management is preferred
* Proven years plus office experience is preferred. We are open to different background in this role. The key aspects are that the individual is a self starter, someone who is proactive with an enthusiasm to learn


 Equinix is committed to ensuring that our employment process is open to all individuals, including those with a disability. If you are a qualified candidate and need assistance or an accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
   

  

 Equinix is an Equal Employment Opportunity and, in the U.S., an Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to unlawful consideration of race, color, religion, creed, national or ethnic origin, ancestry, place of birth, citizenship, sex, pregnancy / childbirth or related medical conditions, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital or domestic partnership status, age, veteran or military status, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, political / organizational affiliation, status as a victim or family member of a victim of crime or abuse, or any other status protected by applicable law.

title: Customer Service Rep
description:
***This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.***
**Vantive: A New Company Built On Our Legacy**
 Baxter is on a journey to separate our ~$5B Kidney Care segment into a standalone company. Vantive\* will build on our nearly 70-year legacy in acute therapies and home and in-center dialysis to provide best-in-class care to the people we serve. We believe Vantive will not only build our leadership in the kidney care space, it will also offer meaningful work to those who join us.
   

  

 At Vantive, you will become part of a community of people who are focused, courageous and don’t settle for the mediocre. Each of us are driven to help improve patients’ lives worldwide. Join us as we revolutionize kidney care and other vital organ support.
   

  

* Completion of the proposed separation of Kidney Care from Baxter into a standalone company (to be named Vantive) remains subject to the satisfaction of customary conditions.


 Serves as primary contact for customer inquiries, order processing, and coordinating customer service needs with other functions as required (such as with product availability issues). Serves as customer contact (by telephone or email) regarding such matters as ordering, scheduling, and shipping.
   

  

 CS Representative Swedish and Finnish speaking to work mainly with B2B-orders and to be a back-up to our Finnish representative in Finland
   

  

**Essential Duties And Responsibilities**
* Receives and process orders via telephone, mail and EDI until invoiced.
* Respond to customer questions and requests via telephone or mail.
* Log and solve customer related issues with regards to shipments, invoices orders etc.
* Manages customer returns according to SOP for returns
* May setup new accounts, maintain other records, prepare required reports.
* Keep customer files updated.
* Support business with information when applicable
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams in Customer service related projects
* Back up reception
* Place orders and invoice on Finnish market (Baxter OY) and Norwegian market (Baxter AS).


**Must Have Experience**
* High school diploma required.


**Desirable Experience**
* Minimum 2-3 years of experience in Customer Service


**What We Can Offer**
* A challenging opportunity for you and also a chance to work in a diverse and experienced team with a great mix of people. Joining Baxter means joining a team that you can truly learn from!
* Independent position with an opportunity to build your own strategy and make a real impact
* A chance to further build your professional experience in the area of health care
* Internal training tailored to business needs and career goals
* Stability of employment in a recognizable and established company
* You will gain excellent exposure and fantastic industry knowledge within the territory working for a global organization


**Reasonable Accommodations**
 Baxter is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities globally. If, because of a medical condition or disability, you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or interview process, please click on the link here and let us know the nature of your request along with your contact information.
   

  

**Recruitment Fraud Notice**
 Baxter has discovered incidents of employment scams, where fraudulent parties pose as Baxter employees, recruiters, or other agents, and engage with online job seekers in an attempt to steal personal and/or financial information. To learn how you can protect yourself, review our Recruitment Fraud Notice.
   

  

 138320

title: Junior mekanikkonstruktör till ett spännande teknikkonsultföretag
description:
*Är du på jakt efter drömjobbet inom konstruktion och vill utvecklas i rollen som teknisk konsult? Är du dessutom en skicklig relationsbyggare och gillar att jobba mot uppsatta mål? Sök då tjänsten som mekanikkonstruktör till Eurocon!*
*Välkommen in med dig ansökan! Urval sker löpande!*
**Vi söker dig som är…**
 …en problemlösare ut i fingerspetsar. Du är duktig på att driva fram ditt arbete och nyfiken på att lära dig det du inte kan. Du har stark kommunikationsförmåga och vågar ta för dig. Du är en lagspelare och är mån om att bidra och göra ett bra jobb. Du är dessutom flexibel och trivs i en föränderlig miljö där du får vara med och göra skillnad. Du är noggrann och mån att alltid leverera högsta kvalité i dina uppdrag.
   

  

 För att kunna passa in behöver du uppfylla nedan krav:
   

  

* Teknisk utbildning inom CAD-konstruktion, mekanik, energiteknik eller arbetat dig till motsvarande kunskap
* CAD-kunskaper
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Körkort B
* God datorvana och grundläggande kunskaper i MS Office-paketet


 Meriterande:
   

  

* Jobbat som processoperatör eller drifttekniker
* Arbetat i E3D, Autodesk Plant 3D eller Cadmatic


**Om rollen**
 Som konsult hos Eurocon kommer du arbeta i spännande uppdrag hos kunder inom energi, industri eller samhällsbyggnad. Rollen ger en fantastisk möjlighet att jobba i projekt från ax till limpa och därav bidra och påverka på riktigt. Gruppen som du kommer tillhöra består av 8 drivna och kunniga experter inom området.
   

  

 Exempel på några arbetsuppgifter är:
   

  

* Delta i hela processen från förprojekt till idrifttagning
* Laserskanning och 3D-medellering
* Framtagning av layouter och konstruktionslösningar
* Projektering av rörsystem och mekaniska konstruktioner
* Tekniskt stöd under alla delar av projektet, exempelvis i val av material och komponenter
* Hållfastighets beräkningar, inköp och projektplanering


**Eurocon**
 Eurocon är teknikkonsultföretag som startades 1990 av 7 ingenjör. Idag bidrar de med teknisk kunnande inom skogsindustrin, gruvindustrin, energi, infrastruktur, kemi, verkstad och IT. Tjänsterna omfattar hela livscykeln för en investering, från förstudie till genomförandeprojekt och underhåll. Sedan 2023 är Eurocon dotterbolag till Rejlers Sverige AB och behåller sitt varumärke.
   

  

**Framtiden AB**
 Framtiden arbetar med både bemanning och rekrytering, vi vill göra skillnad i människors liv. Skillnad gör vi genom att hjälpa människor att hitta rätt jobb och rätt kollega. Vi är specialister på att rekrytera rätt talanger till rätt företag. Framtiden finns på sju orter i Sverige samt i Oslo.
   

  

 För denna tjänst kommer du inledningsvis vara anställd genom oss på Framtiden för att sedan gå över och bli anställd direkt hos Eurocon.
   

  

**Rekryteringsprocessen** 
 :
   

  

* Intervju med Framtiden
* Referenstagning
* Intervju med Eurocon
* Beslut och backgrundskontroll


**Villkor**
 Startdatum: hösten 2024
   

  

 Placeringsort: Liljeholmen
   

  

 Arbetstider: Kontorstider
   

  

 Omfattning: Heltid
   

  

***Urval sker löpande! Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!***
